remarks: The determinant function is additive for each row (matrices are given explicitly by their entries).  (Contributed by SO, 16-Jul-2018.)
statement:
mdetrlin2.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdetrlin2.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.

mdetrlin2.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
mdetrlin2.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> X e. K ) $.
mdetrlin2.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> Y e. K ) $.
mdetrlin2.z $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> Z e. K ) $.
mdetrlin2.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. N ) $.
mdetrlin2 $p |- ( ph -> ( D ` ( i e. N , j e. N |-> if ( i = I , ( X .+ Y ) , Z ) ) ) = ( ( D ` ( i e. N , j e. N |-> if ( i = I , X , Z ) ) ) .+ ( D ` ( i e. N , j e. N |-> if ( i = I , Y , Z ) ) ) ) ) $.
